"E:\Jetbrains\CLion 2025.1\bin\cmake\win\x64\bin\cmake.exe" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug "-DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=E:/Jetbrains/CLion 2025.1/bin/ninja/win/x64/ninja.exe" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=D:/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake -G Ninja -DPython_EXECUTABLE=D:/Progetti/Arduino/3D-Printer-Firmware/.venv/Scripts/python.exe -DPython3_EXECUTABLE=D:/Progetti/Arduino/3D-Printer-Firmware/.venv/Scripts/python.exe -S D:\Progetti\Arduino\3D-Printer-Firmware -B D:\Progetti\Arduino\3D-Printer-Firmware\cmake-build-debug
-- Running vcpkg install
Detecting compiler hash for triplet x64-windows...
Compiler found: E:/VisualStudio/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.44.35207/bin/Hostx64/x64/cl.exe
The following packages are already installed:
  * fmt:x64-windows@11.2.0
    gtest:x64-windows@1.17.0#1
    spdlog:x64-windows@1.15.3
  * vcpkg-cmake:x64-windows@2024-04-23
  * vcpkg-cmake-config:x64-windows@2024-05-23
The package gtest is compatible with built-in CMake targets:

    enable_testing()
    
    find_package(GTest CONFIG REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE GTest::gtest GTest::gtest_main GTest::gmock GTest::gmock_main)
    
    add_test(AllTestsInMain main)

The package spdlog provides CMake targets:

    find_package(spdlog CONFIG REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE spdlog::spdlog)

    # Or use the header-only version
    find_package(spdlog CONFIG REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE spdlog::spdlog_header_only)

All requested installations completed successfully in: 717 us
